Getting help
If you feel you are having 
difficulties	coping	with	your	
baby’s crying, talk to your 
midwife or health visitor. Or 
contact Cry-sis on 08451 
228669	–	they	will	put	you	
in touch with other parents 
who have been in the same 
situation. If you have twins or 
more, the crying can seem 
relentless	–	Twinline,	0800	138	
0509,	can	offer	support.
